title: Ticket #3977: installed man pages have incorrect references to HTML manual
description:
We include links to other sections of the manual within our manual pages. This works well when looking at the manual posted on line. However, if looking at the manual using man, where the man pages are installed as man pages, these links are missing, because they are relative in the HTML generated by LaTeX and latex2html.

A fix might make all these URLs within man pages absolute. That requires a bit of LaTeX macro writing, as the man page needs to go with a release. It also means that installed man page may be out of date, as few probably re-install the man pages with each new release of HTCondor.

A workaround will locate all LaTeX references within man pages and reword them to not contain the references/links.
